ModMetaData.name: Mid-saver Saver
ModMetaData.author: Owlchemist
ModMetaData.description: This mod aims to fix the odd hash collision that may happen when you add a mod mid-save. This works by temporarily disabling compression on definitions. To use this mod, you must: 1.) install it *without* adding the problematic new mod. 2.) load your save, then immediately save the game and exit. 3.) Disable this mod, and enable the mod that was giving your problems. Play as normal. Do not leave this mod enabled.
